ExampleDesign.Name: Versal_APU_RPU_perf
ExampleDesign.Description:
This example design demonstrates Versal Processor performance on Xilinx VCK190 evaluation kit. Application Processing Unit (APU) and Real-time Processing Unit (RPU) reside within Processing System (PS).
DDR4/LPDDR4 memory can be selected through GUI. Design connects APU and RPU to LPDDR4/DDR4 memory through Network on Chip (NoC). NoC routing for APU to DDR4/LPDR4 and RPU to DDR4/LPDDR4 paths is optimized.
Design supports JTAG, QSPI boot modes and includes basic peripherals such as GEM, SD, USB, I2C and CAN.
